pr_title: [Test] Skip node_type setting in transport client

timeline.message:
[Test] Skip node_type setting in transport client

The license integTest would copy node settings into the transport
client settings. This no longer works (since #64015) because the
node types generated in the server test case are not applicable to
transport client

timeline.bodyText: Is this comment out of place? I understand it is carried over from the previous method. But should it be in the transportClientPlugins method?
timeline.author: ywangd
